message.body: I’m sitting here, rereading these articles and thinking, wow, I’m really nervous for tomorrow. My mind wandered to our meeting. In the beginning of our discussion you mentioned you felt insecure about what you hadn’t read. I have to say, what I admire most about you and Zach isn’t what you guys know (though you sure know a lot) but your courage and confidence to share your opinions. I’m glad I have an opportunity tomorrow to (1) share my own opinions and (2) help expose these students to a more nuanced way of looking at a text. Do you want to meet briefly before and go over a game plan? Or phone chat during lunch tomorrow?
you’re very nice. let’s chat at lunch tomorrow. i have a thesis meeting with ceren before class.
is there a big brown paper roll in the classroom?
Hrmmmm. Dunno!
yo. i have another question
are you awake?
What's up?
do you have an outline for class tomorrow?
for what you want to accomplish
i’m setting up some sort of schedule
but I’m going pretty deep into carey
and I’m not sure how you guys what to run things
The only thing we need other than your stuff is to talk about the John Cage assignment that they competed for last week.
ok great. so other than that, i completely run the class?
You got it.
holy shit. nice
ok
so then let me clarify
which readings do you want me to definitely touch on
Well they need to be ready to write this paper so I'd like to cover Carey (x2), Davis, and Juregenson
ok
so i know we went over this on saturday, but didn’t realize i was solely covering them. I’m glad i clarified.
Well Jan and I will be there too :-)
ok so wait can i call you
can we chat now
Sure
